items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India markets to open higher led by Wall Street gains, Chinese support
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian equity benchmark indices BSE Sensex and Nifty 50 were set for a positive open on Tuesday, led by record closing highs overnight on the Wall Street.

items.title: Market today: GIFT Nifty tops 26k, China rate cut, Northern Arc IPO listing
items.description: Share market today: GIFT Nifty futures breach the 26,000 level for the first time, Northern Arc, Arkade Developers and Western Carriers to list on NSE BSE

items.title: Stocks To Watch: Adani Power, Vodafone Idea, PNB, Reliance Power, V2 Retail
items.description: Stocks to watch today: Indian equity benchmark indices were headed for a strong open on Tuesday, led by record closing highs on the Wall Street by benchmark indices S&P 500 and the Dow.

items.title: Here's how to trade Nifty Financial Services, PSU Bank indices on Sept 24
items.description: The Nifty Financial Services Index has recently approached its resistance level of 25,000, which is a crucial round figure for short-term traders.

items.title: Dividend, bonus, stock-split: Bajaj Holdings, 7 others go ex-date tomorrow
items.description: Here is the list of stocks trading ex-date tomorrow due to dividend, amalgamation, bonus issue, and stock split

items.title: Strong content pipeline, asset light model to drive gains for PVR Inox
items.description: Most brokerages believe that the content pipeline in the December quarter will help the company surpass the performance in Q2FY24

items.title: Asia stocks rise to highest in 2.5 year on China's stimulus measures
items.description: China's central bank on Monday lowered its 14-day repo rate by 10 basis points, days after disappointing markets by not cutting longer-term rates

items.title: Firstsource Solutions shares gain 3% after arm buys Ascensos for GBP 42 mn
items.description: The surge in Firstsource Solutions share price came after the company announced that Firstsource Solutions UK Limited, a wholly-owned subsidiary of the company, has acquired  Ascensos for 42 mn pounds

items.title: GR Infra shares climb 6% on emerging lowest bidder for project of Rs 904 cr
items.description: The uptick in the share price of GR Infraprojects came after the company announced that it has emerged as the lowest bidder (L-1) for a project worth Rs 903.534 crore from Maharashtra Metro Rail Corp.

items.title: Northern Arc Capital makes stellar debut, lists at 33% premium on BSE, NSE
items.description: Northern Arc Capital shares listed at Rs 351 on the BSE, reflecting a premium of 33.40 per cent against the issue price of Rs 263

items.title: Arkade Developers shares make strong debut, list at 37% premium on bourses
items.description: Arkade Developers made a good share market debut on Tuesday, however was lower than Street's expectations. Shares listed at Rs 175.9, reflecting a premium of 37.42 per cent against the IPO issue price

items.title: Western Carriers makes sluggish debut, lists at 1% discount on BSE
items.description: Shares of Western Carriers (India) made a sluggish debut on the bourses, listing at Rs 170 against the IPO issue price of Rs 172 on the BSE

items.title: AstraZeneca Pharma receives nod for cancer drug Durvalumab; stock soars 12%
items.description: The uptick in AstraZeneca share price came after the company announced that it has received permission to import for sale and distribution of Durvalumab 120 mg/2.4 mL and 500 mg/10 mL sol from CDSO.

items.title: Ipca Labs shares hit lifetime high after Nomura raises target price
items.description: Ipca laboratories share price surged up to 3.66 per cent intraday, hitting their all time high at Rs 1509.45 per share on the BSE

items.title: Max Healthcare market cap tops Rs 1 trillion; shares rally 1% in 1 month
items.description: At 09:58 AM, with Rs 1.07 trillion market cap, Max Healthcare was trading 4 per cent higher at Rs 1,099.65, as compared to 0.13 per cent gain in the benchmark index.

items.title: Nifty Metal shines as Chinese central bank cuts interest rate
items.description: Metal stocks rallied in India on Tuesday morning, after the People's Bank of China (PBOC) lowered the 14 day reverse repo rate by 10 bps

items.title: Paytm shares rise 3% after Emkay upgrade to 'Add'; doubles target price
items.description: The surge in the Paytm stock was fueled by domestic brokerage Emkay's upgrade to 'Add' from 'Reduce.'

items.title: Motilal Oswal MF buys 2% in smallcap stock that is up 1,515% in 16 months
items.description: V2 Retail was locked in 5% upper circuit at Rs 1,284.85 on the NSE after Motilal Oswal MF bought a 2 per cent stake in the company via the open market on Monday.

items.title: Here's why Pondy Oxides shares rose 5% on September 24; details here
items.description: The uptick in share price came after the company announced that it will raise funds worth Rs 250 crore via QIP, coupled with the record date announcement for the stock-split.

items.title: Reliance Power hits 5% upper circuit after board's nod for fundraise
items.description: Reliance Power share price was locked in the 5 per cent upper circuit at Rs 40.06 per share on the BSE. The stock also reached its 52-week high on Tuesday

items.title: JPMorgan bullish on India, Japan; to allocate resources in Southeast Asia
items.description: JPMorgan expects its commercial banking business, which is focused on mid-sized companies, to grow as much as 30 per cent in India over the next few years, Leenart said

items.title: Power Grid gains 2% on securing transmission system project in Gujarat
items.description: Power Grid will install STATCOMs--electronic devices that regulate voltage on power grids, at Khavda along with associated bay extension work in Gujarat

items.title: This jewellery stock hit record high on plans to mull fundraise on Sept 26
items.description: The uptick in share price came after the company announced that its board will meet on September 26 to consider the proposal for raising of funds.

items.title: Spandana Sphoorty shares gain 4% on plans to sell loans, stressed assets
items.description: Spandana Sphoorty Financial share price surged up to 3.82 per cent at Rs 615 per share intraday on the BSE
